From:' (USANYS)" < 
To: ' (USANYS) 
[Contractor]" 
Subject: RE: Outstanding requests - update 
Date: Mon, 09 Sep 2019 21:43:38 +0000 
We had understood the signed post orders to be individually signed by each officer, but this may be it. We should have 
confirm though. 
From: (USANYS) [Contractor] < 
Sent: Monday, September 9, 2019 5:26 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Outstanding requests - update 
I think the file "SHU Training 06-06-19 & Information" may be the post orders. It's too big to attached so I've sent the 
folder path. 
\usa.doj.gov\ clouanys \StAndrews SharethInReEpsteinDeath-2019R01059 \ Evidence \ MCC Regs 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Monday, September 9, 2019 5:07 PM 
To: (USANYS) [Contractor] 
Subject: RE: Outstanding requests - update 
c=> 
Yes please, thank you. 
(USANYS) 
From: (USANYS) [Contractor] 
Sent: Monday, September 9, 2019 5:05 PM 
To: 
(USANYS) 
O; 
(USANYS) <> 
Subject: RE: Outstanding requests - update 
Will do. Shall I also add other things that we are missing (prisoner remand forms, running boards, etc.)? 
From: (USANYS)<a> 
Sent: Monday, September 9, 20194:55 PM 
To: 
(USANYS) [Contractor] 
Subject: RE: Outstanding requests - update 
> 
Thanks for following up on this. 
(USANYS) 
I did not see the signed SHU post orders. They should look like a series of rules and regulations for the post that are 
signed by each officer. They are different from the daily rosters. And we should ask for the daily rosters for the time 
period we are missing. 
When you're ready, could you follow up with I= (copying us) on the outstanding items? Thank you. 
From: (USANYS) [Contractor] 
Sent: Monday, September 9, 201910:56 AM 
EFTA00030705

To: (USANYS) < (USANYS) <> 
Subject: Outstanding requests - update 
I'm working though the outstanding requests, specifically those that we sent last week. 
The Commissary Reports are in the shared here: 
\usa.doj.gov\ clouanys \StAndrewASharealnReEpsteinDeath-2019R01059 \ Evidence Epstein General BOP Records 
Additionally, the records for M, and (no or =) are here as well (in the same document). 
However, all they entail is a  single truview page and nothing else. The actual receipts are only for Epstein, M, and 
Ruga rd. 
What I'm not sure on is the signed SHU post order review sheets. I have looked through the files and can't seem to find 
them anywhere. Albeit I don't know what they look like but I do think I would have recognized them. I will keep looking. 
Lastly, are the post orders for SHU the same as the daily assignment roster? I've attached one of them as an example. If 
so, we are missing several from the time period that we requested (7/1 â€”  8/10). 
I'm going to continue to work through the spreadsheet as well. 
Paralegal Specialist 
U.S. Attorney's Office 
SDNY 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
Office: 
Cell: 
EFTA00030706
